placed_ship 
 int placed_ship

Navy 
 Navy(int n_ships)
Construct a navy. If place_ships is true, place the ships at random positions.
Parameters:
n_ships - - the maximum number of ships in the navy.

placeShip 
  public boolean placeShip(Ship one_ship,
                           WorriedSea sea)
Place a ship on the sea. The ship is only placed if it's completley inside this players area.
Parameters:
one_ship - the ship to place. It already knows it coordinate.
sea - the sea the ship is placed on.
Returns:
True if the ship is placed, false otherwise.
draw 
 void draw(Graphics g)
allPlaced 
 boolean allPlaced()
Returns true if all the ships is placed, i.e. the fleet is ready for combat.
hitBy 
 Ship hitBy(Coord pos)
If there is a ship covering pos, this function bombs that ship
Parameters:
pos - Where the bomb hits.
Returns:
Whats left of the bombed ship, or null if the shot was a miss.
